title: Mobile Banking Apps
description:
Bank Jawara is a modern digital banking platform that aims to redefine the financial experience for Indonesians. With convenience, security, and speed as its core pillars, Bank Jawara is not just a transaction tool—it's also a trusted partner in your financial journey.

Committed to financial inclusion, Bank Jawara is designed to be accessible and enjoyable for everyone, from young people to business owners, from big cities to remote areas. Its intuitive interface and optimized user experience (UX) ensure every interaction is seamless, convenient, and satisfying.

Bank Jawara's visual design combines purple and orange, creating an impression of elegance, wisdom, passion, and optimism—symbolizing the new spirit in the world of digital banking. Beyond functionality, the Bank Jawara app's appearance is also designed to appeal to the eye and heart, making it the preferred choice for today's customers who desire more than just financial services.

title: Food Delivery Apps
description:
Filosofi di balik Jajan.in adalah kesederhanaan dan efisiensi. Kami memahami bahwa saat lapar, pengguna ingin segera menemukan dan memesan makanan tanpa hambatan. Oleh karena itu, desain Jajan.in memprioritaskan:

  • Navigasi Intuitif: Pengguna dapat dengan mudah menemukan apa yang mereka cari, mulai dari kategori makanan hingga restoran favorit.
  • Visual yang Menarik: Tampilan yang bersih dan modern dengan penggunaan warna yang menenangkan dan ilustrasi yang menggugah selera.
  • Proses Pemesanan yang Cepat: Meminimalkan langkah-langkah yang diperlukan untuk menyelesaikan pesanan.
  • Personalisasi: Fitur yang membuat pengalaman setiap pengguna terasa unik dan relevan.

Elemen Utama Desain UI/UX Jajan.in

Berikut adalah beberapa elemen kunci dalam desain UI/UX Jajan.in:

1. Beranda (Home Screen)

  • Pencarian Cepat: Kolom pencarian yang menonjol di bagian atas, memungkinkan pengguna langsung mencari restoran atau jenis makanan.
  • Rekomendasi Cerdas: Bagian "Direkomendasikan Untukmu" yang menampilkan restoran atau hidangan berdasarkan riwayat pesanan, preferensi, dan lokasi pengguna.
  • Kategori Makanan: Ikon atau daftar visual yang jelas untuk kategori makanan populer (misalnya, Nasi Goreng, Kopi, Aneka Bakso, Minuman Segar) agar pengguna dapat menyaring pilihan dengan cepat.
  • Promosi dan Penawaran: Banner atau kartu promo yang menarik perhatian untuk diskon atau penawaran spesial dari restoran.
  • Restoran Populer/Terdekat: Daftar gulir horizontal untuk menampilkan restoran-restoran yang sedang tren atau paling dekat dengan lokasi pengguna.

2. Halaman Restoran (Restaurant Page)

  • Informasi Jelas: Nama restoran, rating, kisaran harga, waktu pengiriman estimasi, dan biaya pengiriman ditampilkan secara menonjol.
  • Menu Terorganisir: Menu restoran dibagi berdasarkan kategori (misalnya, Makanan Pembuka, Hidangan Utama, Minuman, Dessert) agar mudah dijelajahi.
  • Detail Hidangan: Setiap item menu memiliki gambar berkualitas tinggi, deskripsi singkat, harga, dan opsi kustomisasi (misalnya, tingkat kepedasan, tambahan topping).
  • Ulasan Pengguna: Bagian ulasan dan rating dari pengguna lain untuk membantu keputusan pembelian.

3. Proses Pemesanan (Checkout Flow)

  • Keranjang Belanja (Cart) yang Jelas: Menampilkan semua item yang dipilih dengan total harga, diskon, dan biaya pengiriman secara transparan.
  • Opsi Pembayaran Mudah: Berbagai pilihan pembayaran (misalnya, e-wallet, transfer bank, kartu kredit) yang terintegrasi dengan mulus.
  • Alamat Pengiriman Akurat: Fitur auto-detect lokasi atau peta interaktif untuk memudahkan pemilihan alamat.
  • Konfirmasi Pesanan: Ringkasan pesanan yang jelas sebelum pengguna mengkonfirmasi pembayaran.

4. Pelacakan Pesanan (Order Tracking)

  • Status Real-time: Pengguna dapat melacak status pesanan mereka secara real-time, mulai dari "Pesanan Diterima," "Sedang Diproses," "Dalam Perjalanan," hingga "Telah Tiba.
  • Peta Interaktif: Peta yang menunjukkan lokasi pengantar dan perkiraan waktu tiba.
  • Informasi Pengantar: Nama pengantar dan nomor kontak (jika diperlukan).

 5. Fitur Tambahan yang Memperkaya UX

  • Filter dan Sortir: Opsi untuk menyaring restoran berdasarkan kriteria tertentu (misalnya, "Halal," "Gratis Ongkir," "Tercepat") dan mengurutkan berdasarkan rating, harga, atau jarak.
  • Favorit: Pengguna dapat menandai restoran atau hidangan favorit untuk akses cepat di kemudian hari.
  • Notifikasi Personal: Pemberitahuan tentang status pesanan, promo baru, atau rekomendasi yang relevan.
  • Dukungan Pelanggan: Akses mudah ke bantuan atau dukungan jika terjadi masalah.

Dengan pendekatan desain UI/UX yang berpusat pada pengguna ini, Jajan.in tidak hanya sekadar aplikasi food delivery, tetapi menjadi mitra yang menyenangkan dan dapat diandalkan dalam setiap pengalaman kuliner Anda. Kami percaya bahwa setiap detail, sekecil apa pun, berkontribusi pada pengalaman pengguna yang luar biasa.

title: Home Furnishing Retail
description:
Need merupakan sebuah aplikasi Home Furnishing Retail yang menawarkan pengalaman belanja furnitur online yang modern, efisien, dan mudah diakses. Desain dikembangkan melalui riset pengguna dan prototipe interaktif untuk memastikan solusi yang relevan dan fungsional. 

Fitur utama meliputi pencarian produk dengan filter, wishlist, inspirasi desain ruangan, serta proses checkout yang sederhana dan cepat. Antarmuka dirancang dengan tampilan bersih dan navigasi yang intuitif, mendukung kenyamanan pengguna sepanjang perjalanan belanja.

Proyek ini mendapat tanggapan positif berkat desain yang responsif, estetis, dan sesuai dengan kebutuhan pengguna masa kini.

title: Home Furnishing Retail
description: The landing page for a furniture store with a minimalist design is designed with a clean appearance and simple navigation, highlighting superior products in a grid layout, utilizing attractive hero images, customer testimonials, special offers, as well as a neutral color palette and modern typography to create a unique user experience professional, responsive and conversion focused.

title: Redesign Mobile Banking Apps
description:
Bank Jawara now has a new look the latest version has undergone a complete overhaul to meet the evolving needs of its users. As a modern digital banking platform, Bank Jawara is committed to providing easy, secure, and fast financial services, with a fresher design and a smoother user experience than ever before.

This overhaul is not just a cosmetic change, but a strategic step to strengthen its core mission: driving financial inclusion for all levels of Indonesian society. With a more intuitive interface and optimized user experience (UX), Bank Jawara ensures that everyone from new users to experienced customers can enjoy efficient and convenient services.

Bank Jawara's latest visual design features shades of purple and orange, symbolizing elegance, wisdom, passion, and optimism. These colors are not just aesthetic choices, but also a reflection of Bank Jawara's renewed spirit in providing banking solutions that are not only functional but also inspiring.

With this update, Bank Jawara is poised to become the primary choice for people seeking a comprehensive, modern financial experience technologically sophisticated, user-friendly, and strong in value.

title: Carbon Emission Control Application
description: The Zero app is designed with an intuitive UI design that makes it easy for users to record and understand their personal carbon emissions through clear data visualizations. The app’s community page is designed to resemble a social media platform, allowing users to interact, share sustainability tips, and motivate each other through features such as posts, comments, and leaderboards. Meanwhile, the donation feature provides a transparent interface to select and support verified environmental projects, complete with project details, donation progress, and easy payment flow.

title: Website E-Sport Arena Community
description:
The E-Sport Arena Community website is the result of a UI/UX design focused on enhancing the user experience within the esports community. The website is designed to be the primary platform for community members to connect, participate in various events, and easily and conveniently transact merchandise. The design focus for this project is divided into three main sections: the Home page, the event transaction page, and the merchandise transaction page.

The Home page is designed with an appealing visual appearance and intuitive navigation to present the latest information about events, community news, and product highlights. The event transaction page is designed to ensure a fast, practical, and secure registration or ticket purchase process across various devices. Meanwhile, the merchandise transaction page is structured like an online store catalog, with clear product displays, prominent action buttons, and a simple checkout process to enhance user experience.

Overall, this UI/UX design aims to increase user engagement, visually strengthen the E-Sport Arena Community brand identity, and support the digitalization of transactions within an active and dynamic gaming community.

title: Landing Page Website Dimsumku
description:
🍜 Dimsumku — UI/UX Landing Page Design

This landing page is designed as a digital catalog that presents a variety of dim sum options in an attractive and appetizing manner.
The main focus is on the visuals of the food, easy navigation, and a user flow that directly directs you to quick orders via WhatsApp.

🎯 Key design features:

  • Product catalog with tempting dim sum photos
  • “Order Now” CTA that directly links to WhatsApp
  • Customer testimonials to build trust
  • Highlight special promotions that are easily visible

With a clean and warm approach, this design aims to increase conversions while conveying a homey and friendly feel, in keeping with the character of the Dimsumku brand.
